text: ki jo gavor peechhe rah gae the unase kah do ki anaqareeb hee tum sakht jangajoo qaum ke (saath ladane ke lie) bulae jaoge ki tum (ya to) unase ladate hee rahoge ya musalamaan hee ho jaenge pas agar tum (khuda ka) hukm maanoge to khuda tumako achchha badala dega aur agar tumane jis tarah pahalee dapha sarataabee kee thee ab bhee sarataabee karoge to vah tumako dardanaak azaab kee saza dega
